talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Chat_01>Excuse me...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I'd heard that the Yiga Clan had a branch
in this area. If that's true, then it's
important I give it a wide berth.<sp:0:4:0>Do you know of the Yiga Clan or this
nefarious branch of theirs?
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>What luck to have run across such a kind
and knowledgeable soul!

Luckier still, I now have a souvenir to
bring home! Just stay right there, and...
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Ah, a colleague. Though I'm glad for your
presence, <sp:5:1:0>I can't have you hanging
around dressed like that.
We're too close to the nearby Yiga Clan
branch to draw any unwanted attention!
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Is that right? How odd...<sp:0:4:0>I could have sworn I'd seen you running
around the Gerudo Desert before...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Well, if you're also lost, then perhaps
I can guide you...
talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>The Yiga Clan branch isn't far off. Hurry
and get changed before Link can see you!
near_0000: It seems I've lost my way...
